attributes.action: Make car insurance rates equal by law for men and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cheaper car insurance based purely on gender is obviously sexist and wrong.  This should be changed by law so that all insurance companies cannot specifically provide insurance for females only (sheilas wheels, diamond etc)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
